result.arabic_text: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَيُوَفِّيهِمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
result.translation: 57. yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi Abbaasite marah tu-gactek, toysa Yalli ken meqe taamoomih galtoota dudda-luk keenih Acee-le, Yalli koroosannut isi nafsi yudlume mara makicni.
